Title: Provision of Audio Facilities and Maintenance Agreement for the Council Chamber
Description: The current Bosch DCN system with 88 delegate unit was installed in the Council Chamber in 2005 with the County Council purchasing the hardware outright. Most of the audio equipment is still the original equipment and still in good working order however, the equipment is no longer supported by Bosch. Given this the County Council has taken the decision that it needs to replace the microphone system
Supplier [Name|Address|Ref type|Ref Numb: [Auditel Systems|Unit 4 Park House Business Centre, High Wycombe, Bucks, HP12 3DJ|NONE||No|No]

Title: Supply and installation of audio visual at Liverpool Town Hall
Description: Liverpool City Council seeks the supply and installation of audio visual equipment to the main ball room, council chamber and reception room at Liverpool Town Hall.
